tagline: Keep calm and play paint ball!!!
team_size: Team of 6 members. Max. 12 teams on pre-registration basis
description: A team of 6 members each having a paper ring on their head fights against the opponent team. The first team to tear all the rings of the Opponents with their water guns wins
rules: Armor will be provided for cover.
Water will be limited for each team (2 buckets).
Participants will be provided same kind of water guns.
The first team to tear the rings of opponent with water guns within the provided time limit will win.
If any team is not able to tear all rings of opponent team within the time limit then the team whose minimum rings are torn will win.
Registration_type: Pre-registration and first come first serve basis.
Winning_prize: First prize Rs. 1000, second prize Rs. 500
